# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from knitter.webelement import WebElement
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from knitter import log


[文档]class BackTolistButton(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[@class='fa icon-return btn-icon']")

    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[text()='工单类型']")

[文档]    class BuildingName(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='filter-section']/ul/li[@title='#@Name']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def Click(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('@#Name', name)
            super(FilterSidebar.BuildingName, self).Click()

        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='filter-footer']/button")



[文档]class AssetItem(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='node-content-text' and text()='#@Name']")

    def __init__(self):
        by = WebElement.by
        value = WebElement.value


[文档]    def Click_Asset(self, name):
        self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
        super(AssetItem, self).Click()

            value = WebElement.value

            super(TicketExecutorList.TicketExecutorItem, self).Click()

        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//table[@class='table fixed-table']/tbody/tr")



[文档]    class TicketName(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//table[@class='table fixed-table']/tbody/tr[index]/td[4]/span")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def GetTicketName(self, index):
            self.value = self.value.replace('index', index)
            return super(MyTicketFilterList.TicketName, self).GetText()

[文档]class AllTicketList():

[文档]    class TicketName(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//table[@class='table fixed-table']/tbody/tr/td[4]/span[text()='#@Name']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def ClickTicketName(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            super(AllTicketList.TicketName, self).Click()



[文档]        def VerifyExistence(self, name, trueOrFalse=True):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            super(AllTicketList.TicketName, self).VerifyExistence(trueOrFalse)

[文档]class DeleteConfirmDialog():

[文档]    class DeleteButton(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='dialog-actions']//span[text()='删除']")



[文档]def VerifyContain(str, substr):
    log.step_normal("Verify whether Ticket name [%s] contains filter key[%s]"%(str, substr))

    if str.__contains__(substr):
        log.step_pass('Contains!')
    else:
        log.step_fail('Not contains!')



[文档]def VerifyContainStringList(str, substrLi):
    for substr in substrLi:
        if str.__contains__(substr):
            log.step_pass('Contains!')
        else:
            log.step_fail('Not contains!')
